verses.verse: Now these <S%H2063><s%> are the commandments, <S%H4687><s%> the statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and the judgments, <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to teach <S%H3925><s%> you, that ye might do <S%H6213><s%> them in the land <S%H776><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> go <S%H5674><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it:

That <S%H4616><s%> thou mightest fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his statutes <S%H2708><s%> and his commandments, <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee, thou, <S%H859><s%> and thy son, <S%H1121><s%> and thy son's <S%H1121><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy life; <S%H2416><s%> and that <S%H4616><s%> thy days <S%H3117><s%> may be prolonged. <S%H748><s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> therefore, O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> it; that <S%H834><s%> it may be well <S%H3190><s%> with thee, and that <S%H834><s%> ye may increase <S%H7235><s%> mightily, <S%H3966><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of thy fathers <S%H1><s%> hath promised <S%H1696><s%> thee, in the land <S%H776><s%> that floweth <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>
Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O Israel: <S%H3478><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> is one <S%H259><s%> LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And thou shalt love <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> thine heart, <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> thy soul, <S%H5315><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> thy might. <S%H3966><s%>
And these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day, <S%H3117><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> thine heart: <S%H3824><s%>

And thou shalt teach them diligently <S%H8150><s%> unto thy children, <S%H1121><s%> and shalt talk <S%H1696><s%> of them when thou sittest <S%H3427><s%> in thine house, <S%H1004><s%> and when thou walkest <S%H1980><s%> by the way, <S%H1870><s%> and when thou liest down, <S%H7901><s%> and when thou risest up. <S%H6965><s%>

And thou shalt bind <S%H7194><s%> them for a sign <S%H226><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thine hand, <S%H3027><s%> and they shall be <S%H1961><s%> as frontlets <S%H2903><s%> between <S%H996><s%> thine eyes. <S%H5869><s%>
And thou shalt write <S%H3789><s%> them upon <S%H5921><s%> the posts <S%H4201><s%> of thy house, <S%H1004><s%> and on thy gates. <S%H8179><s%>

And it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall have brought <S%H935><s%> thee into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he swore <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers, <S%H1><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> thee great <S%H1419><s%> and goodly <S%H2896><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou buildedst <S%H1129><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%>

And houses <S%H1004><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> good <S%H2898><s%> things, which <S%H834><s%> thou filledst <S%H4390><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> and wells <S%H953><s%> digged, <S%H2672><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou diggedst <S%H2672><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> vineyards <S%H3754><s%> and olive trees, <S%H2132><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou plantedst <S%H5193><s%> not; <S%H3808><s%> when thou shalt have eaten <S%H398><s%> and be full; <S%H7646><s%>

Then beware <S%H8104><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> thou forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> brought thee forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of bondage. <S%H5650><s%>
Thou shalt fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> him, and shalt swear <S%H7650><s%> by his name. <S%H8034><s%>

Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> of the gods <S%H4480><s%> <S%H430><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are round about <S%H5439><s%> you;

(For <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> is a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God <S%H410><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you) lest <S%H6435><s%> the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against thee, and destroy <S%H8045><s%> thee from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%>
Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> tempt <S%H5254><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> as <S%H834><s%> ye tempted <S%H5254><s%> him in Massah. <S%H4532><s%>

Ye shall diligently keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and his testimonies, <S%H5713><s%> and his statutes, <S%H2706><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee.

And thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> that which is right <S%H3477><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> it may be well <S%H3190><s%> with thee, and that thou mayest go in <S%H935><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers, <S%H1><s%>
To cast out <S%H1920><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

And when <S%H3588><s%> thy son <S%H1121><s%> asketh <S%H7592><s%> thee in time to come, <S%H4279><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> mean the testimonies, <S%H5713><s%> and the statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and the judgments, <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> you?

Then thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> unto thy son, <S%H1121><s%> We were <S%H1961><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> bondmen <S%H5650><s%> in Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> brought us out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand: <S%H3027><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> showed <S%H5414><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> and wonders, <S%H4159><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and sore, <S%H7451><s%> upon Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> upon Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and upon all <S%H3605><s%> his household, <S%H1004><s%> before our eyes: <S%H5869><s%>

And he brought us out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> from thence, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> he might bring us in, <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> us <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he swore <S%H7650><s%> unto our fathers. <S%H1><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> statutes, <S%H2706><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> the <S%H853><s%> LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> for our good <S%H2896><s%> always, <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> that he might preserve us alive, <S%H2421><s%> as it is at this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And it shall be <S%H1961><s%> our righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> we observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H2063><s%> commandments <S%H4687><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> as <S%H834><s%> he hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> us.
